title: Facile fabrication of novel efficient NiCo2O4@NiAl-LDH/NF and high electrochemical performance Fe2O3@rGO electrodes for hybrid supercapacitors
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01714A, Paper
Xiaoxuan Liu, Wenwen Tan, Zao Jiang, Yu Hao, Yong Wang, Jingyi Ye, Qi Feng, Longjun Xu, Chenglun Liu
A hybrid supercapacitor demonstrated an impressive energy density of 107.3 W h kg−1 and a power density of 1008.3 W kg−1.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
